samples.title: Weather App
samples.description: A single page application using the OpenWeatherMap API and Weather Icons that displays the current weather for a Canadian city. Written in Vanilla JS

samples.title: Fermi Guessing Game
samples.description: A number combination guessing game based off of the game of the same name.

samples.title: Text Adventure Game
samples.description: A game that loads a story from a CSV file, that is a Choose Your Own Adventure styled game. Written in Python

samples.title: Bank Machine
samples.description: An application that simulates a bank machine. It stores the accounts in a .dat file.

samples.title: Web Server Tutorials
samples.description: A site that that gives tutorial on installation and testing IIS, Apache, mySQL, phpMyAdmin, PHP, and ASP.NET.

samples.title: Guestbook App
samples.description: An ASP.NET Core application that is connected to a database that holds guestbook entries that are added from the app.

samples.title: Photo Gallery
samples.description: Using an old Photo Gallery application, I migrated it to Angular. Each photo can be commented on.
